videos.videoDescription: ElektraWeb is the most comprehensive cloud hotel management solution on the market; it is a full PMS including booking engine, channel manager, rate manager, POS, and other additional modules. It has all the features and functions your hotel may need.
Save all your hotel features and start managing your hotel in a short time.
How are the basic operations of the front office such as creating reservations, check-in, check-out, folio, invoice quickly on ElektraWeb?
How to define the information front office and online reservation page on the hotel information screen?

videos.videoName: Basic Definitions Menu and Hotel Definition with Different Language Options
videos.videoDescription: What are the mandatory fields that should be defined when a new hotel registration is opened? How to define hotel information in other languages?
How are the room type, room description, room location, room view and bed type defined in Elektraweb?
How is the accounting information in the basic definitions screen defined?
